nodes.text: The gulpers were a species native to Nim Drovis, a planet located in the Meridian sector of the Outer Rim Territories. They occupied the swamps and marshes of Nim Drovis. When the droids C-3PO and R2-D2 arrived on the planet along with the starship captain Bortrek, their landing pad was surrounded by swamps filled with gulpers, marsh-gunnies and green-eyed wadie-platts.
The gulpers were created by Barbara Hambly for her novel, Planet of Twilight, published by Bantam Spectra in 1997.
